content: Stream created by Morgan Rogers.
Christian Williams renamed stream monoids to theory: monoids.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream theory: monoids to deprecated: monoids.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

Home to your favourite one-object categories and perhaps their non-unital cousins.

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: mathematics instead. Home to your favourite one-object categories and perhaps their non-unital cousins.
